pages.text: $(#630000)Can be applied to a $(l:items/guandao)Guandao$()$(#630000). Causes potion effects the wielder has to constantly carry over to buffed parasites, as long as they are in range. They receive a much shorter duration, however, but this isn't an issue as long as the weapon's buffs persist.
$(#630000)Potion effect amplifiers are also capped at the enchantment's level. So Diffusion II with Resistance IV will only apply Resistance II to parasites.
